feed.title: Postiz Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Postiz: Add signature / default signature
New release for Postiz: Auto RSS poster + Changed LinkedIn marketing version fron 202401 to 202501
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Fixed Linkedin
  • Add auto-posting from RSS by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/614 Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.35.1...v1.35.2

entry.title: New release for Postiz: v1.37.1
entry.content:
Whats changed

  • Overall updated Dependencies
  • Telegram alt text fix
  • Jenkins Pipeline Upgrade
  • Unit Testing
  • Maximum Message length Telegram increased
  • Maximum Video Length Instagram increased
  • Added backend port environment setting
  • TikTok Images added

What's Changed (PRs)

  • refactor(telegram.provider.tsx): increase the maximum message length by @sdgsnehal in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/625
  • increase maximum video length for instagram to1 80 by @sdgsnehal in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/629
  • added environment port setting in backend by @tamilarasi-tech in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/633
  • chore(deps): bump @prisma/client from 5.22.0 to 6.4.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/639
  • chore(deps-dev): bump eslint-config-next from 14.2.3 to 15.2.1 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/641
  • chore(deps-dev): bump ts-node from 10.9.1 to 10.9.2 by @dependabot in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/642
  • Update dev branch by @egelhaus in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/645
  • Commented out Bluesky alt text line by @FoamToaster in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/651
  • Upload tiktok images by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/654
  • Upload tiktok images by @nevo-david in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/655
  • Feature requests for unit-testing by @hanzalawebdev in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/658
  • Add functionality of build reports in CI/CD in Jenkinsfile. by @hanzalawebdev in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/664
  • v.37.1 by @egelhaus in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/646

New Contributors

  • @sdgsnehal made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/625
  • @tamilarasi-tech made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/633
  • @dependabot made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/639
  • @FoamToaster made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/651
  • @hanzalawebdev made their first contribution in https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/pull/658

Full Changelog: https://github.com/gitroomhq/postiz-app/compare/v1.36.1...v1.37.1
